Text: I am sure this is for wince but it would be good if you put this info in the description....

So to help this out, as I can confirm this is:

---------
IGO Primo 1.1
Version: 9.2.1.178658
Feb 9 2011
---------

and the Igo primo version is under NGG, NavGear Germany. Thoughts? well with the EXACT same maps its VERY VERY inaccurate compared to my original gps version iGO 8.3.4.117940. Also when I started IGO Primo it complain that I have little memory(I have 64mb in my gps) so it used some microsd momory, anyway that wasn't the problem. My iGO 8.3 is just much more accurate with same maps/pois.
oh and its Windows CE version for sure :}
